claim_text: On 1 January 2025 Labour scrapped the VAT exemption and business rates relief for private schools.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: Incorrect. While the standard rate of 20% VAT applies to private school fees for terms starting after 1 January 2025, no changes have yet been made to the business rates relief that applies to some private schools. A bill has been introduced which would remove this relief for most private schools in England with charitable status from April 2025, but this has not yet passed into law.

review_rating.alternateName: Incorrect. While the standard rate of 20% VAT applies to private school fees for terms starting after 1 January 2025, no changes have yet been made to the business rates relief that applies to some private schools. A bill has been introduced which would remove this relief for most private schools in England with charitable status from April 2025, but this has not yet passed into law.

claim_text: A video shows a multimillion dollar home owned by German Chancellor Olaf Scholz that was recently destroyed by wildfires in Los Angeles.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: Incorrect. A spokesperson for the German government said these claims were “fictitious”, and there’s no evidence Mr Scholz owns any property in the US. The house shown in the video is actually an LAPD police academy owned by the City of Los Angeles, and has not been burnt down by the wildfires.

review_rating.alternateName: Incorrect. A spokesperson for the German government said these claims were “fictitious”, and there’s no evidence Mr Scholz owns any property in the US. The house shown in the video is actually an LAPD police academy owned by the City of Los Angeles, and has not been burnt down by the wildfires.

claim_text: President Trump has changed divorce law to stop 50% distribution of property.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. No such change has been made to divorce law at a federal level at the time of writing. Only nine states have rules that generally mean marital property is divided equally if a couple cannot otherwise agree on the distribution.

review_rating.alternateName: False. No such change has been made to divorce law at a federal level at the time of writing. Only nine states have rules that generally mean marital property is divided equally if a couple cannot otherwise agree on the distribution.

claim_text: 25% of your electricity bill is down to costs associated with Net Zero.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. For a typical household on an electricity-only tariff, environmental and social policy costs amount to 16% of the total price cap. Not all of these costs go towards environmental, or ‘Net Zero’, schemes.

review_rating.alternateName: False. For a typical household on an electricity-only tariff, environmental and social policy costs amount to 16% of the total price cap. Not all of these costs go towards environmental, or ‘Net Zero’, schemes.

claim_text: The IMF forecast that Britain will have the fastest growing economy in Europe.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. IMF figures show several European countries are projected to have higher GDP growth than the UK in 2025 and 2026. The UK economy is forecast to be the fastest growing among European countries in the G7.

review_rating.alternateName: False. IMF figures show several European countries are projected to have higher GDP growth than the UK in 2025 and 2026. The UK economy is forecast to be the fastest growing among European countries in the G7.

claim_text: Photos show a baby recently abandoned in Newhaven in Sussex and Drayton in Shropshire.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. Police forces operating in these parts of the UK confirmed these posts are not genuine. The photos were shared by a US police force in November 2023 about a baby who had been found safely there.

review_rating.alternateName: False. Police forces operating in these parts of the UK confirmed these posts are not genuine. The photos were shared by a US police force in November 2023 about a baby who had been found safely there.

claim_text: The mayors of London, Birmingham, Leeds, Blackburn, Sheffield, Oxford, Luton, Oldham and Rochdale are all Muslim.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: Incorrect. London, Rochdale, Oldham and Luton are known to currently have Muslim mayors, but there’s no evidence that the current mayors of Birmingham, Leeds, Blackburn, Sheffield or Oxford are Muslim.

review_rating.alternateName: Incorrect. London, Rochdale, Oldham and Luton are known to currently have Muslim mayors, but there’s no evidence that the current mayors of Birmingham, Leeds, Blackburn, Sheffield or Oxford are Muslim.

claim_text: 40% of the recently announced energy price rise is due to costs associated with Net Zero.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. Of the £111 increase to the energy price cap from April 2025, approximately 10% is accounted for by an increase in environmental and social scheme costs (or 22% of electricity-only bills)

review_rating.alternateName: False. Of the £111 increase to the energy price cap from April 2025, approximately 10% is accounted for by an increase in environmental and social scheme costs (or 22% of electricity-only bills)

claim_text: Brigitte Macron, wife of the French President Emmanuel Macron, is allegedly a man and a picture shows her as a boy during childhood.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: This is false. The boy in the picture is Mrs Macron’s brother, Jean-Michel Trogneux. Two women who falsely claimed that Mrs Macron is transgender have been found guilty of slander in France.

review_rating.alternateName: This is false. The boy in the picture is Mrs Macron’s brother, Jean-Michel Trogneux. Two women who falsely claimed that Mrs Macron is transgender have been found guilty of slander in France.

claim_text: Bill Gates wrote an article headlined “Depopulation through forced vaccination: the zero carbon solution!”
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. This article was written by another person about Mr Gates. We can find no evidence Mr Gates has written or said anything about killing people through forced vaccines.

review_rating.alternateName: False. This article was written by another person about Mr Gates. We can find no evidence Mr Gates has written or said anything about killing people through forced vaccines.

claim_text: A photo shows a hospitalised woman who was found stabbed by a canal in Bradford on the night of 18 February.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. This is an old photo showing a woman who was injured in a car accident in South Australia in 2017, and West Yorkshire Police told Full Fact this is a hoax post.

review_rating.alternateName: False. This is an old photo showing a woman who was injured in a car accident in South Australia in 2017, and West Yorkshire Police told Full Fact this is a hoax post.

claim_text: 78% of Muslim women and 63% of Muslims do not work, receive state support, and get free accommodation.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: Incorrect. In 2021, 37% of Muslim adult females were in employment, as were 51.4% of all Muslims of working age. We don’t know how many benefit claimants are Muslim.

review_rating.alternateName: Incorrect. In 2021, 37% of Muslim adult females were in employment, as were 51.4% of all Muslims of working age. We don’t know how many benefit claimants are Muslim.

claim_text: Footage shows passengers praying onboard an Azerbaijan Airlines flight before it crashed in Kazakhstan on 25 December 2024.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. The clip was taken during an Air Algérie flight that experienced a technical problem in September 2024. It returned to Algiers and landed safely.

review_rating.alternateName: False. The clip was taken during an Air Algérie flight that experienced a technical problem in September 2024. It returned to Algiers and landed safely.

claim_text: Scotland has announced a ban on domestic cats.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. The Scottish government has made no such announcement, and has said it won’t introduce a ban on cats under any circumstance.

review_rating.alternateName: False. The Scottish government has made no such announcement, and has said it won’t introduce a ban on cats under any circumstance.

claim_text: A picture shows a man who is on the run in England following the murder of two female police officers.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. No such murders have been reported and the man in the photograph has been in custody in the US for more than a year.

review_rating.alternateName: False. No such murders have been reported and the man in the photograph has been in custody in the US for more than a year.

claim_text: Amazon is working with Age UK to give iPad Pros to those over 50 to increase online connectivity.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. Amazon has confirmed this is not a genuine deal. Age UK has said it is not working with Amazon on any such project.

review_rating.alternateName: False. Amazon has confirmed this is not a genuine deal. Age UK has said it is not working with Amazon on any such project.

claim_text: Lidl is selling Smeg brand kettles for £3.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. Lidl told Full Fact all genuine offers will appear on its website, and searching it for ‘Smeg’ produces no results.

review_rating.alternateName: False. Lidl told Full Fact all genuine offers will appear on its website, and searching it for ‘Smeg’ produces no results.

claim_text: A man in a photograph is a serial killer currently robbing people’s houses and shooting them dead in England.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. The man pictured was detained in Mexico in May 2024 and extradited to the United States after 22 years on the run.

review_rating.alternateName: False. The man pictured was detained in Mexico in May 2024 and extradited to the United States after 22 years on the run.

claim_text: A photo shows Melania Trump reading the programme at Jimmy Carter’s funeral service upside down.
label: not_credible

reviews.label: not_credible
reviews.original_label: False. This image has been edited. Live footage of the same moment shows she is holding the programme the correct way up.

review_rating.alternateName: False. This image has been edited. Live footage of the same moment shows she is holding the programme the correct way up.

label: not_credible

reviews.original_label: Incorrect. The image has been modified with or created by a Google Artificial Intelligence (AI) program.

review_rating.alternateName: Incorrect. The image has been modified with or created by a Google Artificial Intelligence (AI) program.

label: not_credible
